pr_title: KOGITO-3499 - Serve dashboards as static files

timeline.message: add undertow dependency in final project

timeline.bodyText:
I don't like the name of the methods this class: generate prefix make me thing that the actual generation of the dashboard is done as part of the method while here is just a factory for GeneratedFile.
What about rename the class as DashboardGeneratedFileUtils so that we can just use operational, domain and list as name of the methods?
timeline.author: danielezonca
